function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misuse and misrepresentation of WBE data","Impact":"Potential privacy issues and stigmatization of societal groups","Mitigation":"Manage privacy issues and ethical considerations, reduce the risk of stigmatization through careful handling of data","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, ethical guidelines for WBE","People":"Societal groups, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Sampling from smaller subgroups leading to stigmatization","Impact":"Stigmatization of vulnerable groups","Mitigation":"Careful selection of subgroups for sampling, education to reduce stigma","Technologies":"Careful subgroup selection, community education programs","People":"Vulnerable groups, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Differences in outbreak handling between developing and developed countries","Impact":"Unequal management of outbreaks due to resource disparities","Mitigation":"International cooperation, resource sharing, capacity-building in developing countries","Technologies":"International health networks, resource allocation tools","People":"Communities in developing countries, global health organizations","Owner":"Global health organizations, international policymakers"}]}
